content:
Given the following scheduling problem:
You are visiting San Francisco for the day and want to meet as many friends as possible. Solve the problem by considering various different schedules and picking the best one to optimize your goals.

Travel distances (in minutes):
Presidio to Marina District: 11.
Presidio to The Castro: 21.
Presidio to Fisherman's Wharf: 19.
Presidio to Bayview: 31.
Presidio to Pacific Heights: 11.
Presidio to Mission District: 26.
Presidio to Alamo Square: 19.
Presidio to Golden Gate Park: 12.
Marina District to Presidio: 10.
Marina District to The Castro: 22.
Marina District to Fisherman's Wharf: 10.
Marina District to Bayview: 27.
Marina District to Pacific Heights: 7.
Marina District to Mission District: 20.
Marina District to Alamo Square: 15.
Marina District to Golden Gate Park: 18.
The Castro to Presidio: 20.
The Castro to Marina District: 21.
The Castro to Fisherman's Wharf: 24.
The Castro to Bayview: 19.
The Castro to Pacific Heights: 16.
The Castro to Mission District: 7.
The Castro to Alamo Square: 8.
The Castro to Golden Gate Park: 11.
Fisherman's Wharf to Presidio: 17.
Fisherman's Wharf to Marina District: 9.
Fisherman's Wharf to The Castro: 27.
Fisherman's Wharf to Bayview: 26.
Fisherman's Wharf to Pacific Heights: 12.
Fisherman's Wharf to Mission District: 22.
Fisherman's Wharf to Alamo Square: 21.
Fisherman's Wharf to Golden Gate Park: 25.
Bayview to Presidio: 32.
Bayview to Marina District: 27.
Bayview to The Castro: 19.
Bayview to Fisherman's Wharf: 25.
Bayview to Pacific Heights: 23.
Bayview to Mission District: 13.
Bayview to Alamo Square: 16.
Bayview to Golden Gate Park: 22.
Pacific Heights to Presidio: 11.
Pacific Heights to Marina District: 6.
Pacific Heights to The Castro: 16.
Pacific Heights to Fisherman's Wharf: 13.
Pacific Heights to Bayview: 22.
Pacific Heights to Mission District: 15.
Pacific Heights to Alamo Square: 10.
Pacific Heights to Golden Gate Park: 15.
Mission District to Presidio: 25.
Mission District to Marina District: 19.
Mission District to The Castro: 7.
Mission District to Fisherman's Wharf: 22.
Mission District to Bayview: 14.
Mission District to Pacific Heights: 16.
Mission District to Alamo Square: 11.
Mission District to Golden Gate Park: 17.
Alamo Square to Presidio: 17.
Alamo Square to Marina District: 15.
Alamo Square to The Castro: 8.
Alamo Square to Fisherman's Wharf: 19.
Alamo Square to Bayview: 16.
Alamo Square to Pacific Heights: 10.
Alamo Square to Mission District: 10.
Alamo Square to Golden Gate Park: 9.
Golden Gate Park to Presidio: 11.
Golden Gate Park to Marina District: 16.
Golden Gate Park to The Castro: 13.
Golden Gate Park to Fisherman's Wharf: 24.
Golden Gate Park to Bayview: 23.
Golden Gate Park to Pacific Heights: 16.
Golden Gate Park to Mission District: 17.
Golden Gate Park to Alamo Square: 9.

CONSTRAINTS: You arrive at Presidio at 9:00AM. Amanda will be at Marina District from 2:45PM to 7:30PM. You'd like to meet Amanda for a minimum of 105 minutes. Melissa will be at The Castro from 9:30AM to 5:00PM. You'd like to meet Melissa for a minimum of 30 minutes. Jeffrey will be at Fisherman's Wharf from 12:45PM to 6:45PM. You'd like to meet Jeffrey for a minimum of 120 minutes. Matthew will be at Bayview from 10:15AM to 1:15PM. You'd like to meet Matthew for a minimum of 30 minutes. Nancy will be at Pacific Heights from 5:00PM to 9:30PM. You'd like to meet Nancy for a minimum of 105 minutes. Karen will be at Mission District from 5:30PM to 8:30PM. You'd like to meet Karen for a minimum of 105 minutes. Robert will be at Alamo Square from 11:15AM to 5:30PM. You'd like to meet Robert for a minimum of 120 minutes. Joseph will be at Golden Gate Park from 8:30AM to 9:15PM. You'd like to meet Joseph for a minimum of 105 minutes.

Your response should start with 'SOLUTION:'.
Write a Python program that solves it using the Z3 solver. Always surround your final code with ```python
YOUR_CODE
```.

```python
from z3 import *

# Define the travel times
travel_times = {
    ('Presidio', 'Marina District'): 11,
    ('Presidio', 'The Castro'): 21,
    ('Presidio', 'Fisherman\'s Wharf'): 19,
    ('Presidio', 'Bayview'): 31,
    ('Presidio', 'Pacific Heights'): 11,
    ('Presidio', 'Mission District'): 26,
    ('Presidio', 'Alamo Square'): 19,
    ('Presidio', 'Golden Gate Park'): 12,
    ('Marina District', 'Presidio'): 10,
    ('Marina District', 'The Castro'): 22,
    ('Marina District', 'Fisherman\'s Wharf'): 10,
    ('Marina District', 'Bayview'): 27,
    ('Marina District', 'Pacific Heights'): 7,
    ('Marina District', 'Mission District'): 20,
    ('Marina District', 'Alamo Square'): 15,
    ('Marina District', 'Golden Gate Park'): 18,
    ('The Castro', 'Presidio'): 20,
    ('The Castro', 'Marina District'): 21,
    ('The Castro', 'Fisherman\'s Wharf'): 24,
    ('The Castro', 'Bayview'): 19,
    ('The Castro', 'Pacific Heights'): 16,
    ('The Castro', 'Mission District'): 7,
    ('The Castro', 'Alamo Square'): 8,
    ('The Castro', 'Golden Gate Park'): 11,
    ('Fisherman\'s Wharf', 'Presidio'): 17,
    ('Fisherman\'s Wharf', 'Marina District'): 9,
    ('Fisherman\'s Wharf', 'The Castro'): 27,
    ('Fisherman\'s Wharf', 'Bayview'): 26,
    ('Fisherman\'s Wharf', 'Pacific Heights'): 12,
    ('Fisherman\'s Wharf', 'Mission District'): 22,
    ('Fisherman\'s Wharf', 'Alamo Square'): 21,
    ('Fisherman\'s Wharf', 'Golden Gate Park'): 25,
    ('Bayview', 'Presidio'): 32,
    ('Bayview', 'Marina District'): 27,
    ('Bayview', 'The Castro'): 19,
    ('Bayview', 'Fisherman\'s Wharf'): 25,
    ('Bayview', 'Pacific Heights'): 23,
    ('Bayview', 'Mission District'): 13,
    ('Bayview', 'Alamo Square'): 16,
    ('Bayview', 'Golden Gate Park'): 22,
    ('Pacific Heights', 'Presidio'): 11,
    ('Pacific Heights', 'Marina District'): 6,
    ('Pacific Heights', 'The Castro'): 16,
    ('Pacific Heights', 'Fisherman\'s Wharf'): 13,
    ('Pacific Heights', 'Bayview'): 22,
    ('Pacific Heights', 'Mission District'): 15,
    ('Pacific Heights', 'Alamo Square'): 10,
    ('Pacific Heights', 'Golden Gate Park'): 15,
    ('Mission District', 'Presidio'): 25,
    ('Mission District', 'Marina District'): 19,
    ('Mission District', 'The Castro'): 7,
    ('Mission District', 'Fisherman\'s Wharf'): 22,
    ('Mission District', 'Bayview'): 14,
    ('Mission District', 'Pacific Heights'): 16,
    ('Mission District', 'Alamo Square'): 11,
    ('Mission District', 'Golden Gate Park'): 17,
    ('Alamo Square', 'Presidio'): 17,
    ('Alamo Square', 'Marina District'): 15,
    ('Alamo Square', 'The Castro'): 8,
    ('Alamo Square', 'Fisherman\'s Wharf'): 19,
    ('Alamo Square', 'Bayview'): 16,
    ('Alamo Square', 'Pacific Heights'): 10,
    ('Alamo Square', 'Mission District'): 10,
    ('Alamo Square', 'Golden Gate Park'): 9,
    ('Golden Gate Park', 'Presidio'): 11,
    ('Golden Gate Park', 'Marina District'): 16,
    ('Golden Gate Park', 'The Castro'): 13,
    ('Golden Gate Park', 'Fisherman\'s Wharf'): 24,
    ('Golden Gate Park', 'Bayview'): 23,
    ('Golden Gate Park', 'Pacific Heights'): 16,
    ('Golden Gate Park', 'Mission District'): 17,
    ('Golden Gate Park', 'Alamo Square'): 9
}

# Define the friends' availability
friends = {
    'Amanda': (2*45 + 10, 7*30 + 10),
    'Melissa': (9*30, 17*30),
    'Jeffrey': (12*45, 18*45),
    'Matthew': (10*15, 13*15),
    'Nancy': (17*00, 21*30),
    'Karen': (17*30, 20*30),
    'Robert': (11*15, 17*30),
    'Joseph': (8*30, 21*15)
}

# Define the minimum meeting time for each friend
min_meeting_time = {
    'Amanda': 105,
    'Melissa': 30,
    'Jeffrey': 120,
    'Matthew': 30,
    'Nancy': 105,
    'Karen': 105,
    'Robert': 120,
    'Joseph': 105
}

# Define the variables
s = Solver()

# Define the start time
start_time = 9*00

# Define the end time
end_time = 21*30

# Define the time step
time_step = 15

# Define the possible locations
locations = ['Presidio', 'Marina District', 'The Castro', 'Fisherman\'s Wharf', 'Bayview', 'Pacific Heights', 'Mission District', 'Alamo Square', 'Golden Gate Park']

# Define the possible actions
actions = [(location1, location2) for location1 in locations for location2 in locations]

# Define the variables for the actions
for action in actions:
    s.add(Or([s.int('meet_' + str(i) + '_' + str(j)) for i in range(len(locations)) for j in range(len(locations)) if (i, j) == action]))

# Define the constraints for the friends' availability
for friend, (start, end) in friends.items():
    for i in range(start // time_step, end // time_step + 1):
        s.add(Or([s.int('meet_' + str(locations.index(location1)) + '_' + str(locations.index(location2))) for location1 in locations for location2 in locations if (location1, location2) == actions[i]]))

# Define the constraints for the minimum meeting time
for friend, time in min_meeting_time.items():
    for i in range(len(locations)):
        for j in range(len(locations)):
            s.add(s.int('meet_' + str(i) + '_' + str(j)) >= time)

# Define the objective function
objective = [s.int('meet_' + str(i) + '_' + str(j)) for i in range(len(locations)) for j in range(len(locations))]

# Define the optimization problem
s.add(Maximize(sum(objective)))

# Solve the optimization problem
s.check()

# Get the solution
model = s.model()

# Print the solution
print("SOLUTION:")
for i in range(len(locations)):
    for j in range(len(locations)):
        if model.evaluate(s.int('meet_' + str(i) + '_' + str(j))).as_long() > 0:
            print(f"Meet at {locations[i]} at {model.evaluate(s.int('meet_' + str(i) + '_' + str(j))) * time_step} minutes past 9:00 AM and meet at {locations[j]} at {(model.evaluate(s.int('meet_' + str(i) + '_' + str(j))) + travel_times[(locations[i], locations[j])]) * time_step} minutes past 9:00 AM")

# Print the travel times
print("\nTravel times:")
for i in range(len(locations)):
    for j in range(len(locations)):
        print(f"{locations[i]} to {locations[j]}: {travel_times[(locations[i], locations[j])] * time_step} minutes")
```

This code uses the Z3 solver to find the optimal schedule to meet all friends while minimizing the total travel time. The solution is printed in the format "Meet at location A at time X minutes past 9:00 AM and meet at location B at time Y minutes past 9:00 AM". The travel times between each pair of locations are also printed.
